content:
Would it make sense to have filtering by resource type for history API, similar to how search filtering works (via _type argument)?

So, when client runs /_history?_type=Patient,Encounter it will only get history for Patient and Encounter resources? Currently history seems like a pretty rigid API when using it for multiple types because it's either "all" (every resource type) or "single" (one resource type).
You could submit a change request for this.
